basics.name: Andres de Ferreyra
basics.label: Strategic Business Management and Ad Tech Specialist
basics.summary: Proficient professional with extensive experience in business management strategies and ad tech solutions. High-level qualifications for analyzing market dynamics, developing expansion strategies, and maximizing the effectiveness of advertising campaigns. Utilizes data-driven insights to determine goals and communicate effectively with diverse teams to meet shared objectives. Able to pursue progress for balanced business growth.

work.name: Dapps Factory
work.summary: During my path as Ad Technical Specialist, my responsibilities include end-to-end management of digital advertising campaigns, using my knowledge of ad tech platforms, data analytics, and tracking solutions. I work with teams across functions to drive performance inside campaigns from satisfactory to exceptional levels, and assure the synergy of various channels. I also shared my ideas about what brings successful advertising and how they can apply to different business goals. I am constantly learning and following the latest news and insights.
highlights: End-to-End Campaign Management: Led comprehensive management of digital advertising campaigns, utilizing expertise in ad tech platforms and data analytics to optimize performance.

Collaborative Leadership: Fostered cross-functional collaboration to elevate campaign performance, ensuring synergy across diverse channels and driving results from satisfactory to exceptional levels.
Strategic Insights: Shared insights on successful advertising strategies applicable to diverse business objectives, contributing valuable perspectives to campaign development and optimization.
Continuous Learning: Committed to ongoing learning and staying updated with the latest industry news and insights, maintaining a proactive approach to professional development and innovation.

work.name: Appen
work.summary: I led strategic initiatives to streamline operations, optimize resource allocation, and enhance profitability. Conducted in-depth market research, analyzed data trends, and provided actionable insights.
highlights: Strategic Leadership: Spearheaded initiatives to streamline operations, demonstrating proficiency in strategic planning and execution.
Data-Driven Decision-Making: Conducted thorough market research and data analysis, translating findings into actionable insights to drive informed decision-making.
Profitability Optimization: Successfully optimized resource allocation and enhanced profitability through targeted strategies, showcasing a strong focus on driving sustainable business growth.

references.name: Horacio Lampe
references.reference: Andres is a person committed to his work and a good partner. I had the opportunity to accompany him during his course at the UNIMI, where I saw reflected his level and his ability to deal with projects in a self-taught way, always being present to help a colleague. I think he has great potential to continue growing in the IT field.
